attributes.additional_details: Stansted airport to name 1 place constantly  have flyparkers blocking field entrances, leaving rubbish, using as a toilet! Also stopping residents use the on street parking or allocated parking linked to their house. Secure Parking companies/ taxis and general public are all guilty of this making life for residents unbearable.
attributes.background: With ever increasing traffic in the UK and diabolical parking charges especially at airports, people are forced to flypark on private land, blocking residents driveways, leaving rubbish and decimating the land into a mudbath leading to confrontation with residents.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because are unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We are unsure what you mean by "flyparking". Flyparking often refers to the parking of HGVs overnight outside proper parking places. The Government has said it is considering banning this practice and you could start a petition on it. However, your petition appears to go wider than this. The enforcement of local parking restrictions would be the responsibility of local authorities and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition which sets out clearly what behaviour you would like to see made illegal.
